name: Astronaut Escape
description:
This game was a challenge that I wanted to acheive: To create a game in only two days. 

It's a simple endless runner... Well, not "runner", you are an Astronaut with a jetpack, and you have to dodge some boxes escaping from your spaceship pressing the spacebar.

You will fastly notice that it's really simple, but that's everything I could do, given the fact that every asset, script, audio clip... is created by me. Every suggestion is appreciated.

Thanks for playing!
